languages.text: {n}Худощавый старик глядит доверчивыми фиалковыми глазами, в глубине которых тлеют серебристые искры. Его тело дрожит от легчайшего порыва ветра, однако внутри старческой оболочки все еще таятся могущественные силы. Старик лишь улыбается, кротко кивая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Худощавый старик глядит доверчивыми фиалковыми глазами, в глубине которых тлеют серебристые искры. Его худощавое тело дрожит от легчайшего порыва ветра, однако внутри старческой оболочки все еще таятся могущественные силы. Старик лишь улыбается, кротко кивая.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Худощавый старик глядит доверчивыми фиалковыми глазами, в глубине которых тлеют серебристые искры. Его тело дрожит от легчайшего порыва ветра, однако внутри старческой оболочки все еще таятся могущественные силы. Старик лишь улыбается, кротко кивая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, in whose depths glimmer silvery sparks. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet under the elderly appearance mighty powers still hide. The old man merely smiles, curtly nodding.{/n}

{n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, in whose depths glimmer silvery sparks. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet under the elderly appearance mighty powers still hide. The old man merely smiles, curtly nodding.{/n}

{n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, in whose depths glimmer silvery sparks. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet under the elderly appearance mighty powers still hide. The old man merely smiles, curtly nodding.{/n}

{n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, in whose depths glimmer silvery sparks. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet under the elderly appearance mighty powers still hide. The old man merely smiles, curtly nodding.{/n}

{n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}

{n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El anciano enjuto mira con un par de ingenuos ojos color violeta, cuyo interior centellea con destellos plateados. Su cuerpo es esbelto y maltrecho, pero pese a todo puedes percibir el poder que encierra su cuerpo decrépito. Asiente y sonríe tímidamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El enjuto anciano mira con un par de ingenuos ojos color violeta, cuyo interior centellea con destellos plateados. Su cuerpo esbelto se estremece con la más leve brisa, pero su apariencia decrépita oculta formidables poderes. El anciano se limita a sonreír y asentir brevemente con la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}瘦削的老人睁着紫色的眼睛，注视着正在发生的事情，你注意到他虔诚目光深处闪烁着银色的火花。哪怕是最柔弱的微风，也能让他那具瘦弱的身体不住颤抖，但你依然能感觉到他苍老的外表下隐藏的强大力量。这位老人只是向你微微一笑，顺从地点点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那位瘦削的老人睁着紫色的眼睛，注视着正在发生的事情。他虔诚目光的深处闪烁着银色的火花。哪怕是最柔弱的微风，也能让他那具负伤的瘦削身体不住颤抖，但他苍老的外表下，依然隐藏着强大的力量。这位老人只是向你微微一笑，简单地点点头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme vous regarde calmement de ses yeux violets dans lesquels scintillent des étincelles argentées. Son corps frêle frissonne au moindre coup de vent, mais sous son apparente vieillesse semblent encore se tapir de puissants pouvoirs. Il hoche la tête en affichant un sourire docile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme vous regarde calmement de ses yeux violets dans lesquels scintillent des étincelles argentées. Son corps frêle frissonne au moindre coup de vent, mais sous son apparente vieillesse semblent encore se tapir de puissants pouvoirs. Il hoche la tête en affichant un sourire docile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}細身の老人は、信頼に満ちた紫の瞳で見つめる。その奥底には、銀の火花がまたたいていることにあなたは気がついた。彼の細く傷ついた身体は、わずかな突風にも震えるが、老人の外見の下には強大な力がまだ秘められている。彼はただ微笑み、そっけなくうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は、信頼に満ちた紫の瞳で見つめる。その奥底には、銀の火花がまたたいている。彼の細い身体は、わずかな突風にも震えるが、老人の外見の下には強大な力がまだ隠されている。老人は、ただ微笑み、そっけなくうなずいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der hagere alte Mann sieht mit treuherzigen violetten Augen zu, in denen du silberne Funken zu erkennen glaubst. Sein ausgemergelter Körper erzittert beim kleinsten Windhauch, aber du kannst die hinter seiner gebrechlichen Gestalt verborgene Macht spüren. Er nickt dir mit einem sanften Lächeln zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thin old man looks on with trusting violet eyes, and you notice silvery sparks glimmering within. His thin body shivers from the slightest gust of wind, yet you can still sense the power contained in his elderly frame. He nods with a meek smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der dürre alte Mann sieht mit vertrauensseligen violetten Augen zu, in deren Tiefen silberne Funken schimmern. Sein dünner Körper erzittert beim kleinsten Windhauch, doch unter dem Aussehen eines alten Mannes verbergen sich noch immer mächtige Kräfte. Der alte Mann lächelt lediglich und nickt knapp.{/n}
